Isabella Rodriguez.description: still working at the counter, taking orders and chatting with customers @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about the effects of gentrification in low-income communities through a case study on the impact in Brooklyn, with Klaus Mueller and Maria Lopez planning to meet at Hobbs Cafe to discuss it further. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how's the paper coming along?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, the paper is coming along slowly but surely. I'm trying to make sure I cover all the angles on the effects of gentrification in low-income communities.
Maria Lopez
That sounds like a challenging topic. Have you looked into any case studies or specific examples?
Klaus Mueller
Yes, I actually came across a case study on the impact of gentrification in Brooklyn. It was eye-opening to see the long-term effects on the local community.
Maria Lopez
That's really interesting. I'd love to hear more about that case study sometime.
Klaus Mueller
I can actually send you the link to the case study if you'd like to read it for yourself.
Maria Lopez
That would be great, Klaus. Thank you for sharing that with me. I'm really interested in learning more about the impacts of gentrification.
Klaus Mueller
I'll send you the link right now. Do you want to grab a coffee sometime and discuss it further?
Maria Lopez
Sure, I'd love to grab a coffee and discuss the case study with you.
Klaus Mueller
Great, how about we meet at Hobbs Cafe tomorrow afternoon around 2pm?
Maria Lopez
Sounds good, see you tomorrow at 2pm at Hobbs Cafe!
Klaus Mueller
Awesome, I'll see you tomorrow at 2pm at Hobbs Cafe then. Looking forward to our discussion!
Maria Lopez
Looking forward to it too! See you then.
Klaus Mueller
Great, I'll prepare some notes on the case study to discuss tomorrow at Hobbs Cafe.
Maria Lopez
Thank you Klaus, I'll make sure to read the case study before our meeting tomorrow.
Klaus Mueller
Great, I'll make sure to prepare some notes on the case study for our discussion tomorrow at Hobbs Cafe.
